title: Fix app startup hang when user profile query fails (show error + recovery options)

requirements.text: Update the app startup/auth gate to handle failures when loading the caller user profile so the UI never gets stuck on an indefinite loading screen. Specifically, when `useGetCallerUserProfile()` returns an error (e.g., backend unreachable / actor not available), render a clear error state with recovery actions instead of showing the “Setting up your profile...” spinner.
acceptanceCriteria: If `getCallerUserProfile` fails (network error, canister error, or actor not available), the app shows an error screen instead of an infinite loading state.
The error screen contains user-facing text in English that indicates the app failed to load required data and suggests trying again.
The error screen provides a “Retry” action that re-attempts loading the profile (via React Query refetch/invalidation).
The error screen provides a “Logout” action to allow the user to re-authenticate if the identity/session is in a bad state.
When the backend becomes reachable again, using “Retry” successfully proceeds into the app without requiring a full page reload.

requirements.text: Add a safe client-side recovery path for cases where the PWA/service worker cache or a bad client state prevents the app from opening, by providing a “Hard reload” action in the startup error UI that clears relevant browser caches (including service worker caches if present) and reloads the page.
acceptanceCriteria: The startup error UI includes a “Hard reload” action.
“Hard reload” clears Cache Storage entries created by the app (best-effort) and then reloads the page.
If a service worker is registered, the hard reload flow attempts to unregister it (best-effort) before reloading.
The hard reload flow does not throw uncaught exceptions if any operation fails (e.g., permissions, unsupported APIs).

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only shadcn components).
Do not edit immutable hook files: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)` and `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`. Implement startup error handling in app-level components instead.
nonGoals: Adding new features unrelated to app startup reliability.
Changing backend schemas or business logic for flat numbering as part of this request.
